title: exposure
extract: exposure noun (EXPERIENCE) ​ C1 [ C or U ] the fact of experiencing something or being affected by it because of being in a particular situation or place: You should always limit your exposure to the sun. Even a brief exposure to radiation is very dangerous.
extract_html: exposure noun (EXPERIENCE) ​ C1 [ C or U ] the fact of experiencing something or being affected by it because of being in a particular situation or place: You should always limit your exposure to the sun. Even a brief exposure to radiation is very dangerous.
